Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: a painting of a vibrant sunset beach

A detailed beach and its water is the only focus of this painting. Extensive time has been spent on the beach itself, as amongst the tan sand are black streaks of darker sand, swirled artistically. Boulders, rocks, and large pebbles dot the sand in seemingly random places, most of them are black or dark brown but a few smaller rocks are a striking, contrasting white. Where the shore meets the water, a line of white appears, with the obvious purpose to define water from land. The base color of the water is a greenish-blue with varying shades of blue and white on top of it to represent waves. The waves are not the best and it's clear water is not this artist's forte. Where the water meets the sky is a defined line of orange, presumably to define water from sky. A large semi-circle of orange and red take up most of the sky as it represents the setting sun. Reflected in the water is a narrowing line of the orange, setting sun. They sky is completely void of any traditional blue, instead a reddish orange is painted for the sky. The further up the sky goes, the darker red it blends into. A lone palm tree is harshly slanted to the right and is completely black due to the setting sun, the wind has shaped the poor palm tree to its liking. In the lower right hand corner is Gabrielle's elegant signature.
*ooc inspiration http://www.ozoneeleven.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Summer_Sunset_1600-x-1200-1024x768.jpg
A painting of an empty beach during sunset.
